# f5distributedcloud_api_group_element (Resource)

Manages an F5 Distributed Cloud API Group Element. API Group Elements define individual API endpoints within a group.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the API Group Element.
- `namespace` (String) Namespace where the API Group Element is created.

### Optional

- `description` (String) Description of the API Group Element.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Unique identifier for the API Group Element.
